name: HotelTonight Git Flow Scripts
body:
### HotelTonight Git Scripts

These are our Git workflow scripts. We use the same workflow as GitHub, per Scott Chacon's [GitHub Flow](http://scottchacon.com/2011/08/31/github-flow.html). 

See [our blog entry about it](http://engineering.hoteltonight.com/79320846)
tagline: These be our git workflow scripts
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
